ComicInfo.Summary:
Check out this all-new anthology from some of the biggest talents in the industry! Stories spotlight a space heist on a ghost ship, a spirit who wants to play synthesizer in a techno band, a ghost-for-hire haunting agency and others dark, twisted tales.
With stories and art by some of comics’ greatest talents, this special features a cover by Dave Johnson, and a variant cover by Brendan McCarthy!
*Story Titles* The Night After I Took the Data Entry Job I Was Visited by My Own Ghost (Ewing/Dayglo) The Dead Boy Detectives in "Run Ragged" - Part One: The Isle of Dogs (Litt/Buckingham/Santos) Wallflower (Castelluci/Reeder) The Boy and the Old Man (Kubert) A Bowl of Red (Kleid/McCrea) Bride (Choi/Jimenez) Treasure Lost (Pope/Lapham) The Dark Lady (Hernandez) Ghost-for-Hire (Johns/Lemire) Note: The Dead Boy Detectives in Run Ragged is a story in three parts: "Part Two: Let Slip the Dogs" and "Part Three: Gone to the Dogs" would be released in the following anthologies Time Warp #1 (March 2013) and The Witching Hour #1 (October 2013) respectively. In December 2013, Vertigo then launched a new ongoing title, The Dead Boy Detectives.
The Dead Boy Detectives created by Neil Gaiman.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/ghosts-1-my-own-ghost-the-dead-boy-detectives-in-r/4000-364099/
